column3: Gerbert longs for the days when statues of Rhalgr dotted the Peaks.
Examine the statues at the designated locations.
Ah, good to see you again. Pleased to say those rats have not bothered me since you scared them off.
In fact, could I ask for your help once more?
The Peaks used to be filled with more Rhalgr statues than you could shake a stick at. Of course, the Empire did not approve of this and ordered them all to be destroyed.

Though as luck would have it, I have heard two survived. The only issue is the bridges that used to lead to them have fallen into disrepair. Hence why I have been unable to check them myself. Please search for them in my place.
I have marked both their locations on your map. Good luck!
I have marked the locations of both Rhalgr statues on your map. Good luck!
The statue is missing two key components: an arm and its head.
This statue has also seen better days.
Oh, that is truly a shame. I suppose it was foolish of me to get my hopes up.
The monks belonging to the Fist of Rhalgr and the religion's followers used to go on pilgrimages often to compare the different statues.
No matter how long it takes, I will make sure the statues are reconstructed. I will not stand back and watch as this tradition dies.
My thanks for taking on such a difficult task. Here, take this as your payment.
